title: 11 Stunning Pictures Of Different Cities Around The World Captured Through Open Doors & Windows
text:
We are already in October. So don't blame me, if I am already scheming up ways and means that will enable me to spend my new year's eve at a beautiful destination.

While we start to save up money for this extravagant getaway, it's important to dream a little. That's why, we put together this gorgeous collection of the most stunning photos that showcase some cities through open doors and windows, to ignite our wanderlust. From the crystal-blue waters in Portugal to the picturesque scenery in Yosemite, these breathtaking images are bound to kick start your sense of adventure. Click ahead for the virtual vacation of your dreams.
